about_the_game:
Enter the Warring States Era
The God of War, Chiyou, has long been defeated, and the Yan-Huang alliance of humans came to dominate the lands. For over 1000 years, humans have co-existed and thrived with other races on the continent. Now, as the Zhou royal family is in decline, numerous powers are on the rise.Amidst this struggle for dominance, the era of the Warring States begins! Forces lurking in the shadows are stirring, and ancient beasts are poised for return.

How will you write your chapter in this grand epic?



























--------------------------------------------------------------------

Gameplay


·Huaxia: Warring States Combines Roleplaying, Strategy, and Management Elements·
Embark on an epic adventure in a sandbox world set in the mythological Warring States era. The world is based on real geography, striving to accurately represent the diverse landscapes of the Nine Provinces map. Experience dynamic changes in scenery with the passing of time, including day and night cycles and seasonal transitions. Dynamic NPCs and a variety of interactions offer an immersive experience. This provides players with a stage to write their own epic story."

·Choose a Unique Bloodline·
Choose a unique background and inherit distinct bloodline powers. Featuring eight families, birthplaces from the Nine Provinces, Zodiac signs, and dozens of unique traits. These combinations result in truly diverse character with a set of beliefs, destinies, philosophies, innate abilities, and elemental compatibilities according to the Five Elements.

·Rich Character Development·
An expansive character development system with a rich growth framework provides 3 core directions of Essence, Energy, and Spirit, 9 secondary attributes, and 18 types of skills for character growth. Unique talent pathways lead to various martial arts builds. The combination of the Five Elements with Yin and Yang, as well as the Bagua, results in a multitude of rich weapon skill combinations.

·Survive and Thrive·
Employ strategy or force to establish yourself in this chaotic world. You will interact with characters of different backgrounds, and will need to judge the outcomes of these interactions based on their beliefs, philosophies, personalities, and characteristics to achieve their goals. You can learn from NPCs or resort to aggression and deceit.

·Recruit Heroes and Build Your Empire·
Recruit talented individuals to your team, and expand your power base. Manage your clan's growth and assign official positions to clan members, bringing strong benefits to the development of your kingdom

·Construct Your Empire·
Collect materials and manage your estate and fiefdom. Cultivating the retainers you have recruited and assign them tasks. Plan the development direction of your power strategically and make deployments; tailor the growth paths of your subordinates according to personal preferences. Apply the philosophies of the Hundred Schools of Thought to management your state. Dispatch merchant caravans to trade between nations and enhance economic strength. Mobilize troops, organize military expeditions, and supply your armies. Strategize and tactically grow your nation, eventually unifying the realm by overcoming other lords. Huaxia: Warring States aims to offer players the most comprehensive and authentic experience of the Warring States period.

A massive world. Bing, Ji, Jing, Qing, Yan, Yang, Yong, You, Yu - the Nine Provinces encompassing 52 prefectures, 52 cities, and over 300 villages. And numerous secret realms and cities of other mysterious groups.

Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, Legalism, Militarism, Agrarianism, Logicians, Diplomacy, Yin and Yang - nine major schools of thought clash intensely. Choose to join one, or integrate the strengths of several. Rise through the ranks to unify the realm, or roam as a lone warrior.

Please join our Discord where internal testing, event content, and project progress updates are shared. You also have the chance to directly interact with the game developers!

And please don't forget to Wishlist!

name: Huaxia: Warring States

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Build your own epic story in the Huaxia: Warring States. Start a clan, conquer the lands, and build an empire. Or roam the Nine Provinces as a lone warrior fighting bandits and monsters. The choice is yours!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
